title: Print
medium: Hand-colored lithograph (engraving?) on heavy cream wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted across plate beneath image: Tribulations du Commerce / No. 2 / Le Detalage / (ou gare la pluie!!); in lower left margin: Genty Editeur; lower right: M. de Cheyere r.
description: Textile shop exterior in the wind with 6 young male clerks attempting to take in bolts of fabric in anticipation of rain; hand-colored in brush and pink, pale blue, and yellow watercolor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print.
Hand-colored lithograph (engraving?) on heavy cream wove paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-398.
